body:
Hey, so yeah. I've been watching alot of movies and series about Zombies or other stuff. 

And i'm a little curious, what would my friends or YOU do in a Zombie Apocalypse. (if it ever happened, which i doubt it would sometime).
body_tagged:
Hey, so yeah. I've been watching alot of movies and series about Zombies or other stuff. 

And i'm a little curious, what would my friends or YOU do in a Zombie Apocalypse. (if it ever happened, which i doubt it would sometime).
title: What would you do in a Zombie apocalypse?

replies.body: get a gun and shoot zombis
replies.body_tagged: get a gun and shoot zombis

replies.body: ^ Shoot the zombies. Mate, they don't wanna mess with me x)

replies.body:
So i'm lazy to update the thread, but i'd do it like this:

Find som survivors, gather supplies, food etc.. Find weapons, but i guess that'd be hard since i'm in Sweden. 

Maybe set up a big camp somewhere where it ain't big cities and such, not the woods but somewhere else which is not the ''woods, cities or smaller towns''. Recruit people to fight these monsters! 

And then i'll find a good looking girl also :D
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: I would go to the Supermarket/Pharmacy, steal everything that I could and then make a defence at my boyfriend's house (he has like generators and stuff, plus a really big house to hide in) and then i would try survive there for as long as possible, luckily I live in a place where everyone is old so the Zambies would be easy to kill if need be!
